title: 66: Ecosystem agriculture, the probiotic turn and regenerative flower growing
subtitle: 66: Ecosystem agriculture, the probiotic turn and regenerative flower growing
summary: This month we are introduced to the importance of ecosystem architecture by a forest ecologist and winegrower. We hear from two researchers investigating a shift in how we understand our relationship with the natural world - from one where humans are in control, to one where we work with other life-forms and biological processes to build human and ecosystem health. And we finish hearing one grower’s experience of implementing regenerative techniques on her flower farm.
